articles.title: All Samsung Galaxy Phones Since 2014 Are Vulnerable To This Zero-Click Exploit, Patch Now - Hot Hardware
articles.description: Left unpatched, every Galaxy phone dating back to 2014 is vulnerable to a so-called 'zero-click' bug related to Android's handling of the custom Qmage image format (.QMG).
